campfire_events.title: Toll of Kindness
campfire_events.description: A passerby’s stash has been disturbed. What remains is chalk glyphs in a Tellurian hand and a smear of road-dust. The air carries coastal hills, Wyre forests, mustering fields, patrol roads, chalk cliffs.
campfire_events.prompt: Do you intervene, investigate, or keep moving?

campfire_events.description: A half-buried token suggests someone from Clan Slade passed through recently, leaving behind chalk glyphs in a Tellurian hand. The air carries coastal hills, Wyre forests, mustering fields, patrol roads, chalk cliffs.
campfire_events.prompt: Do you follow the sign, ignore it, or mark it for later?

travel_events.title: A Borrowed Map
travel_events.description: Weather turns odd, like a blessing turned sideways. chalk glyphs in a Auric hand flutters where no wind should reach. The air carries marshlands, salt-roads, windmills, reed canals, storm flats.
travel_events.prompt: Do you follow the sign, ignore it, or mark it for later?

travel_events.title: Smoke on the Horizon (02)
travel_events.description: A small dispute simmers on the road, with Clan Farmer names thrown like knives and a pilgrim’s bead-string offered as proof. The air carries marshlands, salt-roads, windmills, reed canals, storm flats.
travel_events.prompt: Do you intervene, investigate, or keep moving?

travel_events.prompt: Do you intervene, investigate, or keep moving?

steps.text: A figure offers a deal in Clan Karr’s name, swearing on a wax seal stamped with Pelagos’s sigil.

outcome.text: You burn through 2 rations before the dust settles. A small sign of Pelagos lingers: a sigil in wax, a prayer knot, a whispered thanks. Local tension rises a notch.

travel_events.title: Riddle on Slate
travel_events.description: A small dispute simmers on the road, with Clan Rowthron names thrown like knives and a Pelagic prayer-knot offered as proof. The air carries sunlit coves, reef shallows, tide caves, bright sails, salt hymns.
travel_events.prompt: Do you take a risk for a quick gain, or play it safe?

travel_events.prompt: What do you do first?

campfire_events.description: A half-buried token suggests someone from Clan Rowthron passed through recently, leaving behind a votive charm of Pelagos. The air carries sunlit coves, reef shallows, tide caves, bright sails, salt hymns.
campfire_events.prompt: Do you follow the sign, ignore it, or mark it for later?

campfire_events.description: You find a marker scratched with Clan Rowthron runes, tucked beside chalk glyphs in a Pelagic hand. The air carries sunlit coves, reef shallows, tide caves, bright sails, salt hymns.
campfire_events.prompt: Do you take a risk for a quick gain, or play it safe?

campfire_events.title: Quiet Shrine (07)
campfire_events.description: Weather turns odd, like a blessing turned sideways. a strip of Pelagic ribbon flutters where no wind should reach. The air carries sunlit coves, reef shallows, tide caves, bright sails, salt hymns.
campfire_events.prompt: What do you do first?

campfire_events.title: Riddle on Slate (09)
campfire_events.description: A small dispute simmers on the road, with Clan Rowthron names thrown like knives and a wax seal stamped with Pelagos’s sigil offered as proof. The air carries sunlit coves, reef shallows, tide caves, bright sails, salt hymns.
campfire_events.prompt: Do you help, bargain, or refuse?

campfire_events.prompt: Do you help, bargain, or refuse?
